backend/AltSignup.mo: Provides a simple signup handler with basic empty-field validation and a simulated success response.
backend/main.mo: Main actor offering user profile storage with access control checks for saving and retrieving profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Defines a feature evidence report describing a UI fix in Landing.tsx and its related components and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global CSS rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up fonts and configuring II_URL before loading the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Specifies alternative origins allowed for Internet Identity derivation.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects unknown routes to index.html for client-side routing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router with the root layout and all application routes.
frontend/src/auth/iiConfig.ts: Provides shared Internet Identity client and login configuration using environment-derived settings.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthDiagnos: Debug panel showing Internet Identity state, timing, and stall detection when enabled.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthErrorPa: Reusable error panel with retry and navigation actions for authentication-related failures.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPopupHe: Inline help panel explaining blocked II popups with retry and direct-link actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Status banner showing auth step progress, timing, outcomes, and retry/direct-link options.
frontend/src/components/auth/CanisterWar: Banner indicating backend warmup, success, or failure with optional retry.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Detects II authorize callback and redirects based on onboarding status.
frontend/src/components/auth/PatchedInte: Loads II config then wraps children in a configured InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/UsernamePas: Empty placeholder file for a username/password auth form.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Wraps all pages with onboarding context and the Internet Identity authorize callback handler.
frontend/src/components/TaskModal.tsx: Task timer modal with adjustable duration, countdown logic, and completion controls.
frontend/src/config/ai.ts: Deprecated AI config stub returning empty inactive settings.
frontend/src/contexts/OnboardingResultCo: Context that loads, stores, and clears onboarding results in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthAttemptGuard.t: Manages lifecycle state for a user auth attempt with timing and correlation IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthFlowDiagnostic: Tracks detailed auth-flow steps, timings, slow-step detection, and outcomes for diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanisterWarmup.ts: Simplified warmup hook that immediately marks state as ready and supports optional auto-start and manual retry.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, clear, and status tracking, initializing AuthClient and restoring identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentitySi: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useMobileInternetIden: Mobile-focused II login hook that pre-initializes AuthClient and returns detailed login outcomes like blocked or cancelled.
Patched mobile II login hook using shared configuration for AuthClient and structured outcome reporting.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordIdentity.t: Context provider managing password‑based identities with storage restore, set, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostAuthTimeout.ts: Manages per-phase post-authentication timeouts with elapsed tracking and reset control.
frontend/src/hooks/useStalledAuthDetecti: Detects stalled authentication steps using step-specific timeouts and reports stall state, timing, and reason.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH theme tokens for the app’s chocolate-themed design, including typography and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/aiClient.ts: Legacy AI client that throws an error and should not be used.
frontend/src/lib/aiProxyClient.ts: Implements the AI proxy client with request/response types, validation, error handling, and helpers for onboarding and daily step generation.
frontend/src/lib/onboardingPlaceholder.t: Provides storage key plus safe JSON parse and stringify helpers for onboarding data persistence.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Daily.tsx: Fetches and displays AI‑generated daily tasks with loading, error handling, and task modal interactions.
frontend/src/pages/Fridge.tsx: Shows hardcoded chocolate inventory stats with period switching (week, month, all time).
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with feature slides, modal navigation, and links to signup/login.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Implements the Internet Identity login flow with phased state handling, timeout guards, mobile fallbacks, diagnostics, and post-auth routing.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Guides authenticated users through a multi-step onboarding form and generates a personalized plan via the AI proxy API, saving results to context.
frontend/src/pages/Signup.tsx: Handles user signup through Internet Identity with detailed auth-state phases, error handling, mobile login support, diagnostics, and post-auth redirects.
frontend/src/pages/SignupTest.tsx: A simplified backup signup page that triggers Internet Identity login and redirects to onboarding once identity and actor are ready.
frontend/src/pages/SweetSummit.tsx: Displays the user’s personalized AI-generated goal and weekly plan, or redirects them to onboarding if no results exist.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklyMountain.tsx: Generates or loads a cached weekly mountain plan based on onboarding results, with error handling, caching, and restart options.
frontend/src/utils/authDiagnostics.ts: Provides types and utilities for tracking auth steps, generating correlation IDs, and logging step transitions and outcomes.
frontend/src/utils/identityValidation.ts: Validates identities and detects stale sessions by checking anonymity and delegation validity.
frontend/src/utils/passwordIdentity.ts: Creates deterministic Ed25519 identities from credentials and manages storing, restoring, and clearing them in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/platform.ts: Detects Chrome on Android and caches platform info for mobile-specific auth behavior.
frontend/src/utils/safeRender.ts: Safely converts unknown AI values to strings and provides helpers for validating and extracting string fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL and sessionStorage parameter retrieval, persistence, and cleanup for routing and state management.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the app’s styling system.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, known issues, and feature requests for the SweetSteps app.
